page.title: 13AT SCHOOL PART-1
page.content: The school day starts at 9:05. When a bell rings and everyone goes to morning registration. Another bell rings at 9:15, which signifies the end of registration . On Wednesdays and Fridays, our year has an assembly in the school hall at this time. When we sing and pray and any notices are read out. On Mondays, Tuesdays and Thursdays, we stay in our form rooms and talk or do homework. At 9:25 the bell rings for the start of lessons. We have 8 periods per day, and each period is 35 minutes long. We usually have 2 periods to each subject. The subjects that I study are maths, English, art, cooking, geography, physical education, history, French, German, physics, chemistry, biology, textiles and religious education. {continues on page 14
